prop.name: representativeOfPage
prop.desc: Indicates whether this image is representative of the content of the page.

prop.name: thumbnail
prop.desc: Thumbnail image for an image or video.

MediaObject.name: uploadDate
MediaObject.desc: Date when this media object was uploaded to this site.

MediaObject.name: playerType
MediaObject.desc: Player type required—for example, Flash or Silverlight.

MediaObject.name: bitrate
MediaObject.desc: The bitrate of the media object.

MediaObject.name: requiresSubscription
MediaObject.desc: Indicates if use of the media require a subscription (either paid or free). Allowed values are true or false (note that an earlier version had 'yes', 'no').

MediaObject.name: regionsAllowed
MediaObject.desc: The regions where the media is allowed. If not specified, then it's assumed to be allowed everywhere. Specify the countries in ISO 3166 format.

MediaObject.name: embedUrl
MediaObject.desc: A URL pointing to a player for a specific video. In general, this is the information in the src element of an embed tag and should not be the same as the content of the loc tag.

MediaObject.name: contentUrl
MediaObject.desc: Actual bytes of the media object, for example the image file or video file.

MediaObject.name: associatedArticle
MediaObject.desc: A NewsArticle associated with the Media Object.

MediaObject.name: productionCompany
MediaObject.desc: The production company or studio responsible for the item e.g. series, video game, episode etc.

MediaObject.name: duration
MediaObject.desc: The duration of the item (movie, audio recording, event, etc.) in ISO 8601 date format.

MediaObject.name: encodesCreativeWork
MediaObject.desc: The CreativeWork encoded by this media object.
